events.message: We have received the candidate's application for the software engineer position, including their resume, cover letter, and portfolio link.
The application has been reviewed and categorized under the Engineering cluster due to relevant software development experience and skills mentioned.
A recruiter with expertise in engineering roles has been assigned to manage the candidate’s recruitment process and coordinate the next steps.
The recruiter conducted an initial screening call to assess the candidate’s technical background, communication skills, and cultural fit for the development team.
The candidate responded promptly and enthusiastically to the screening feedback, expressing strong interest in the next technical interview stages.
A technical interview has been scheduled with the engineering team for the candidate, set for the upcoming Friday morning via video conference.
